sentence.Network_en: The student, Laura Spence, won a scholarship to Harvard but was rejected by Oxford University.

sentence.Network_en: Spence suggested that the decision to acquire a degree might be a signal.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯宾塞提出,攻读一个学位的决定可能是一个信号.

sentence.Network_en: Music is appreciated for the public. So everyone here enjoys tonight. Welcome to come back Spence.
sentence.Network_cn: 音乐是属于大家的. 今晚就让大家拥有你们的音乐. 欢迎回到史宾赛.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: shortening of Old French despense, from Latin dispensa, feminine past participle of dispendere (see dispense)
